H0.text: Where certain religions divide the notion of heaven into parts there are generally. 3

H1.text: Where certain religions divide the notion of heaven into parts there are generally. 9

H2.text: Where certain religions divide the notion of heaven into parts there are generally. 5

H3.text: Where certain religions divide the notion of heaven into parts there are generally. 7

A4.text: The Quran and Hadith frequently mention the existence of seven samāwāt (سماوات), the plural of samāʾ (سماء), meaning 'heaven, sky, celestial sphere'.

A5.text: In Judaism, the upper part of the universe is made up of seven heavens (Hebrew: shamayim).
